title: Gingerbread fairy cakes with cream cheese icing
ingredients: ['75g unsalted butter, softened', '100g caster sugar', '125ml treacle', '1 egg', '1 egg yolk', '150g plain flour', '1 tablespoon best quality cocoa powder', '1 1/4 teaspoons ground ginger', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon ground allspice', '1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '125ml hot milk', 'Icing', '25g unsalted butter, softened', '50g cream cheese, softened', '80g sifted icing sugar', '1/4 teaspoon lemon extract']
